detail_desc: Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Jacket in sturdy cotton twill with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front, a zipped chest pocket and two side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Slightly longer, straight-cut T-shirt in crushed velvet with gently dropped shoulders.

Fully lined bikini top with a knot detail at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back. Super lift.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake pockets and a zip down the front of the legs.
Shoulder bag in paper straw with an imitation leather flap and handle and metal fastener. Detachable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x12x18 cm.
Baby Exclusive Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style jacket in a jacquard weave containing some wool with notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, front pockets and slits in the sides. Lined.
Bomber jacket in airy satin with a ribbed collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring hem. Unlined.
Bomber jacket in airy satin with a ribbed collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring hem. Unlined.
Metal hand chain in the shape of a skeleton with a bracelet and five links that go over the back of the hand and fingers and are held in place by rings. Adjustable length, 19-23 cm.
Tights with an elasticated waist and invisible reinforcement at the toes. 20 denier.
Tights with an elasticated waist and invisible reinforcement at the toes. 20 denier.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.
Long earrings in wide metal snake chain. Length 14.5 cm.
Push-up bra in microfibre and big hole mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back.
Push-up bra in microfibre and big hole mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back.
Derby shoes in shiny imitation leather with a text print, lacing at the top and gently rounded toes. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a suede flap with a magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring partially covered in imitation leather at the front. Adjustable shoulder strap and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 8x21.5x29 cm.
Large scarf in a wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x200 cm.
Waist belt of imitation leather straps with a decorative knot at the front, and elastic straps at the back with a metal fastener. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Waist belt of imitation leather straps with a decorative knot at the front, and elastic straps at the back with a metal fastener. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Satin loafers with a grosgrain trim around the top, satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Boat-necked blouse in a cotton weave. Long sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Straight-cut silk shirt with a small stand-up collar, bib front with pin-tucks, and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Knee-length skirt in a stretch weave with a subtle herringbone pattern. Concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Platform trainers in imitation leather and satin with lacing at the front. Mesh linings, cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles. Platform 5 cm.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen and a small stand-up collar. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Faux fur coat with wide lapels, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, welt side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, frills at the front, concealed buttons on one shoulder and down the front and long puff sleeves with a button and frill at the cuffs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, frills at the front, concealed buttons on one shoulder and down the front and long puff sleeves with a button and frill at the cuffs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, frills at the front, concealed buttons on one shoulder and down the front and long puff sleeves with a button and frill at the cuffs.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
Top in sequin-embroidered mesh with super-skinny shoulder straps and a lace-trimmed V-neck. Lined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with double shoulder straps that cross at the back and a sewn-in inner top with an elasticated hem (no inner top in sizes 2-8Y).
Short imitation suede jacket with imitation leather details. Large pile collar with double tabs, a diagonal zip at the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Double-breasted coat in a sturdy weave with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.

Printed cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with appliqués and decorative shoulder tabs. Collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and flap chest and front pockets with a button. Lined.
Set with a top, trousers and hat in cotton. Long-sleeved top with a concealed button on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Double-layered jersey hat.
Set with a top, trousers and hat in cotton. Long-sleeved top with a concealed button on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Double-layered jersey hat.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dressing gown in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, tie belt and side pockets.
Short coat in a textured weave with a fringe trim, open front and patch pockets. Unlined.

Romper suit in woven fabric with frills at the top, buttons at the back and narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Wide legs with narrow elastication at the hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Wide-fitting striped cotton jersey top with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with pleats at the top, side pockets, a fake back pocket and a detachable, braided belt with metal rings.
Bikini briefs in soft stretch fabric with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back. Seamless.
Bikini briefs in soft stretch fabric with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back. Seamless.
Fitted top in glossy jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves with open sections and narrow cross-over straps.
Trousers in an airy weave with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and lacing at the front. Smocked seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and lacing at the front. Smocked seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and lacing at the front. Smocked seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.

Wide blouse in a woven cotton blend with glittery thread embroidery. Stand-up collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons. Yoke at the back and wide tie at the top.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a high halterneck collar with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Short jersey top in a cotton blend with a small jersey stand-up collar, yoke at the top, zip with a pendant at the back and long mesh sleeves.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves.
Jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves.
Jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery, parcel-shaped decoration.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with a Santa hat.
Straight-style T-shirt in scuba fabric with a ribbed neckline.
